name: ccusage
description: Usage analysis tool for Claude Code
author: ryoppippi

scripts.prepack: bun run build && bun clean-pkg-json -r scripts.preinstall && cp ../../README.md ./README.md && cp ../../LICENSE ./LICENSE
scripts.test:statusline: cat test/statusline-test.json | bun run start statusline
scripts.test:statusline:all: echo 'Testing Sonnet 4:' && bun run test:statusline:sonnet4 && echo 'Testing Opus 4.1:' && bun run test:statusline:opus4 && echo 'Testing Sonnet 4.1:' && bun run test:statusline:sonnet41
scripts.test:statusline:opus4: cat test/statusline-test-opus4.json | bun run start statusline --offline
scripts.test:statusline:sonnet4: cat test/statusline-test-sonnet4.json | bun run start statusline --offline
scripts.test:statusline:sonnet41: cat test/statusline-test-sonnet41.json | bun run start statusline --offline
